channel.title: In your mouth you will find sunshine - industry city sleepers [Alternative Electronic]
channel.description:
[![industry%20city%20sleepers|500x500](upload://lVbr8HJkeED0WbFyxjXR2uYxnwn.jpeg) ](https://soundcloud.com/icsleepers/in-your-mouth-you-will-find-sunshine) Click above
Infoz: I was inspired by a picture my son brought home from school and was playing around with some of the new features that are coming imminently. It's been awhile since I've released anything (though plenty of things have been started) so it's been nice to get this little jam together, wrap it up and get it out the door.
Thanks all :)

item.title: In your mouth you will find sunshine - industry city sleepers [Alternative Electronic]
